articles.content: TORONTO -- Connor McDavid said there is no timetable to return from a knee injury sustained April 6 and is "just working hard to get to training camp" with the Edmonton Oilers in September.The 22-year-old center is rehabbing from a torn PCL in his left knee s… [+4363 chars]

articles.content:
P.K. Subban could be changing his catchphrase from "Let's go!" to "I do."The New Jersey Devils defenseman proposed to his girlfriend, retired Olympic skier Lindsey Vonn, at their home in Los Angeles on Aug. 14, Vogue reported Friday.
